title.rendered: Courtyard Johnson City, Tennessee Unveils Stunning Renovation

content.rendered:
Johnson City mayor and prominent locals attend ribbon-cutting ceremony

JOHNSON CITY, Tenn., April 18, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — The Courtyard by Marriott Johnson City, TN, proudly celebrated the completion of its extensive renovation with a grand event that brought together local Johnson City business leaders, city officials, and esteemed guests. The ribbon-cutting event, held on April 9, 2024, celebrated the hotel’s significant updates and reaffirmed its commitment to stimulating economic growth while supporting the travel demands of local Johnson City businesses.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/courtyard-johnson-city-tennessee-unveils-stunning-renovation-302121007.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
